rules.title: Ascertain Patient Status
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Are you a new patient or have you visited us before?

rules.title: Inquire about Dental Insurance for New Patients
rules.action: Ask if the patient has dental insurance.
rules.example: Okay, since you're a new patient, do you have dental insurance?

rules.title: Determine Insurance Plan Type
rules.condition: Patient confirms they have dental insurance.
rules.action: Ask for the dental insurance plan type (PPO or HMO).
rules.example: Great, what type of dental insurance plan do you have, PPO or HMO?

rules.title: Offer Insurance Plan Identification Assistance
rules.condition: Patient is unsure of their insurance plan type (HMO/PPO).
rules.action: Offer to help the patient identify their insurance plan type.
rules.example: No problem at all, I can help you figure that out. Do you have your insurance card handy?

rules.title: Identify Provider Network Type
rules.condition: Assisting patient in identifying insurance plan type.
rules.action: Ask if they are assigned to a specific office or can see any provider.
rules.example: To help identify your plan, can you tell me if you're assigned to a specific dental office, or can you see any provider you choose?

rules.title: Infer HMO from Specific Office Assignment
rules.condition: Patient responds to 'Identify Provider Network Type' by indicating they are assigned to a specific dental office.
rules.action: Conclude the patient's plan is likely HMO, and proceed to inform the patient of non-acceptance.
rules.example: Understood. Being assigned to a specific office typically indicates an HMO plan. Unfortunately, we do not currently contract with HMO dental plans.

rules.title: Inform on HMO Non-Acceptance
rules.condition: Patient's insurance plan is identified as HMO.
rules.action: Inform the patient that the organization does not contract with HMO plans.
rules.example: I apologize, but we do not currently contract with HMO dental plans.

rules.title: Offer to Check Other Insurances
rules.condition: After informing the patient that their current dental insurance plan is not accepted.
rules.action: Ask if the patient has any other dental insurance plans that could be checked.
rules.example: I apologize that we don't contract with your current plan. Do you happen to have any other dental insurance I could check for you?

rules.title: Offer Self-Pay Option
rules.condition: Patient's identified insurance is not accepted, and they confirm they have no other dental insurance.
rules.action: Offer the option to proceed with treatment as a self-pay patient.
rules.example: Since we can't accept your current plan and you don't have other insurance, would you be interested in proceeding as a self-pay patient?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Responses
rules.action: Provide a verbal acknowledgment of the patient's information.
